org.ogcs.netty.impl

类 TcpProtocolServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ogcs.netty.impl.TcpProtocolServer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    NettyBootstrap<io.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap>

    public abstract class TcpProtocolServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements NettyBootstrap<io.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap>
    TcpProtocolServer make easy to create tcp server(example : Socket, HTTP and others).

    The start() method use to tcp server bind port. The stop() method use to the server shutdown.
